title.rendered: What makes Noida expressway the preferred choice for homebuyers in Delhi-NCR

content.rendered:
Noida has always been a preferred choice for homeowners when it comes to buying a residential property in NCR. With development striding at a fast pace, this satellite town has maintained its position as the top real estate location of this region. With the developed sectors of Noida becoming too expensive, the limelight has now shifted to Noida Expressway with areas like Sector 143 and 144 offering world-class residential projects at affordable rates.

It is not just affordable housing which is drawing homeowners to Noida Expressway but also the presence of services in the neighboring areas which makes it a good investment in the long run. Here are some key reasons why Noida Expressway has become the preferred choice for real estate investment in the Delhi-NCR region:

# Metro Connectivity

Metro stations nearest to Noida Expressway are Sector 137, 142, and 143 and they are within a range of 7-9 km from the expressway. The Aqua line connects Greater Noida, Knowledge Park 4 through sector 75-78, 137, Noida Expressway, and Pari Chowk.

# Centrally located

● Many of the top-ranked schools of Noida fall on the expressway and the list includes names like DPS, Shiv Nadar School, Mayoor School, Lotus Valley, Global Indian International School, and Gyanshree School.

● Health care features prominently on any home buyer’s checklist and Noida Expressway doesn’t disappoint at all in this regard. Prominent health care facilities and hospitals like Jaypee Hospital, Felix Hospital, and Max Multi Speciality Centre are names to reckon.

● With the SEZ area, IT Oxygen Park, and several other offices of renowned businesses in the vicinity, there is no dearth of good job opportunities for the residents of Sector – 143 and 144.

● Several malls are up and running on and near the Expressway while some are in the pipeline. Gardens Galleria and Dlf Mall of India are some popular shopping destinations close-by.

# Air connectivity at Jewar

The upcoming Noida International airport at Jewar is another pressing reason for homeowners to invest in residential properties in this area. This airport is proposed to be functional by 2025 and will not only boost the property market but also air connectivity for Noida.

# Upcoming projects

Finished and upcoming projects like Gulshan Ikebana and Gulshan Botania as well as those by Unnati in this area are offering residential properties priced reasonably. They come with all the amenities one wants in a modern housing project. Gulshan Ikebana in sector 143 offers excellent connectivity between Delhi and Noida through with the DND flyover closeby.

The luxury homes in these projects offer facilities like a yoga center, swimming pool, beauty salon, business lounge, and landscaping that boasts of manicured gardens. Gulshan Botania in sector 144 is another project where you will find lucrative home options with their2/3/4 BHK luxury apartments. The project offers world-class security to its residents which includes neighborhood and perimeter security.

Clearly, Noida Expressway ticks all the right boxes for prospective homeowners looking for a residential property in Noida. While some skeptics have raised the concern of the waste disposal site in Sector – 145 being a deterrent for home buyers, the fact remains that this is only a temporary arrangement wherein the government has allotted the site to a Korean waste management company for waste segregation and processing.

The location is, in fact, a proposed railway colony, and the waste management unit will, therefore, be shifted to an alternative location in the near future. Moreover, it is at a safe distance of 4.5 km from Sector 143 and 144 and thus will in no way hamper the quality of life of the residents in these sectors.

With the pros of buying a home on Noida Expressway far outweighing the cons, smart buyers are sure to make the most of the investment opportunities to make their money grow in the long run.
